| HistoryText             = The Vegas Gold Chip was a thriving football team. [[Hippo (Earth-616)|Hippo]] was hired by a man named Marlowe to injure the team's quarterbacks since he had heavily bet on the Gold Chips' opponents. After injuring the main quarterback [[Bruce Campitti (Earth-616)|Bruce Campitti]] at a motel, Hippo targeted his backup, [[Kerry Wright (Earth-616)|Kerry Wright]], and attacked him at Las Vegas Stadium. Kerry was saved by the [[Kaine Parker (Earth-616)|Scarlet Spider]].{{r|Ben Reilly: Scarlet Spider Vol 1 14}}
